short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension books warehouse shift automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Warehouse Job Scheduler Chrome extension simplifies the process of securing shifts at Amazon warehouses. With this tool, users can automatically monitor job availability and instantly book shifts when they become available—eliminating the need for constant manual checking.

Key Features:

	•	Automatically monitors active job listings in real-time.
	•	Auto-books available shifts as soon as they are posted.
	•	Ensures fast and efficient booking to help users secure preferred shifts.
	•	Works seamlessly on Amazon’s warehouse job page, integrating with Amazon’s job application portal.
	•	Provides an easy-to-use interface, allowing users to sit back while the extension handles shift bookings.

Whether you’re looking for flexibility, full-time hours, or a quick way to secure shifts, this extension helps you stay ahead.

This website only works on https://hiring.amazon.ca/
--------------------------
v3.10.27
–> Searching for shifts is even faster, now every 0.5 seconds
–> Added more cities
–> Now selects random shifts instead of the middle one, reducing competition
–> Play notification sound issue is resolved
–> More instructions added for setup
–> You can buy credits directly from the extension
--------------------------
v1.10.14

--> Issue with selecting shifts has been resolved.
--> selection of applying application is much faster now
--> issue with contact information page is resolved
--------------------------
v1.10.09
This is the first version of this extension so please expect few bugs here and there. As we get user feedback I will add more functionality. 

--> Currently it supports below cities:
Ajax, Bolton, Brampton, Cambridge, Concord, Etobicoke, Hamilton, Mississauga, Ottawa, Scarborough, ST. Thomas, Sydney, Toronto, Vaughan, Whitby, Windsor.

-->It has Distance and Job type based filter. 

-->Reset button resets all configs.
--------------------------
Users can request more features via email. All kinds of feedbacks are welcomed 🙏
